metadata.title: Mario Luca Giusti Set 6 Lente High Glass White
description: Perfect for indoor or outdoor use, these tumblers from Mario Luca Giusti are made from tough, durable acrylic. Named 'Lente' or "Lens," the pattern is based on cut Bohemian glass of the 20th Century and have a wonderful optical effect. Replicating vintage designs of Bohemian (or American Victorian-era) glassware, the pieces are elegant enough for the finest settings and durable enough for those down-home barbeques. Highball: 6.4" h; 17 oz capacity
